name: @gallolabs/application
description: A nodejs light framework to frame your work

scripts.test: npm run build && npx c8 --all --src 'src' --exclude '*/*test*' --report-dir=/tmp/nyc mocha 'dist/test/*test*.js'
scripts.deploy: npm run test && rm -R dist/test && npm login && trap 'npm logout' EXIT && release-it --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir
